info.title: Things We Lost in the Fire

section.title: We Label Ourselves as the Grumpy Old Men
section.para: Let us introduce ourselves. We're a pair of somewhat aged markup geeks, having worked in the field for some 50 years combined, a lot of which was spent bitching about what had already been. This is not the paper that will reveal all. However, it is the paper that will discuss some of the implications of those 50 years.
Or at least have a few laughs while reminiscing.

If you're one of us - a grumpy old man, basically
No harm in being a grumpy old woman here. , with some years of angled brackets under your belt - you will recognise this diagram, nodding and bitterly thinking back in time. You will have had many experiences relating directly to this simple diagram. Memories.

This is a paper about those memories. We'll go through some of our memories, reliving the key points, bitching about what we went through while thinking - hoping, even - that you'll be nodding right along us.
